text:
In just four days of its release, Avengers: Endgame is on a record-shattering spree. The movie is breaking every possible record in India and abroad, proving that the Marvel world is really special for all the fans!'Avengers: Endgame' is truly proving to be the endgame for all the other films at the box office.
The film, which crossed the Rs 100 crore mark in just two days, has achieved another feat by entering into Rs 150 crore club in just three days of its run at the box office. All the actors who have worked on the film are overwhelmed and extremely for the love that the fans have poured in! Our very own Hulk AKA Mark Ruffalo took to social media to thanks the fans as well as those working at the theatre.
(Also read: 9 Instances That Prove The Frenzy For ‘Avengers: Endgame’ Was Too Much For Cinemas To Handle!)

Apart from thanking all the fans, Ruffalo thanked people who are the most underrated and undervalued! He wrote,
Screengrab
"Thank you to everyone that went to see #Endgame this weekend, reminding us how great it is to watch movies with others. And a special thank you to people working at the theatres this weekend. Love you 3000."
The film has minted Rs 157.20 crore in India so far and earned a gross total of Rs 187.14 crore (India). The Marvel film has surpassed the opening weekend collections of all Hindi films and emerged as the biggest Hollywood opener in India till date.
‘Avengers: Endgame’ released on April 26 and also marks the final film within the Marvel Cinematic Universe's current generation, which comprises of 22 films, including 'Spider-Man: Homecoming' and the recently released ‘Captain Marvel’. It will also be the last Marvel movie for some of the key actors including Chris Evans as Captain America.
'Avengers: Endgame' features a stellar star cast which includes, Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson, Benedict Cumberbatch, Don Cheadle, Tom Holland, Chadwick Boseman, Paul Bettany, Elizabeth Olsen, Anthony Mackie, Sebastian Stan, Danai Gurira, Letitia Wright, Dave Bautista, Zoe Saldana, Josh Brolin, and Chris Pratt.
(Also read: Avengers: Endgame Sets The Box Office On Fire! 5 Records The Film Has Smashed Already)
(With ANI inputs)
